summary: A syntax file to the script files used in the Tikle tool
name: tkl.vim
description:
A syntax file to the script files used by the Tikle tool.

More info about Tikle at http://c2zlabs.com

I've only tested this with Vim 7.1 and 7.2
install_details:
1. Copy the file to ~/.vim/syntax
2. Add the following line to your ~/.vimrc
au BufRead,BufNewFile *.tkl set filetype=tkl
3. Reopen Vim or type :source ~/.vimrc to reload the configuration.
